author: Michelle Jaworski
title: Hot Topic debuts 'Beauty and the Beast' collection | The Daily Dot
text:
Channel your inner Belle. 
The enchanting fashion of Beauty and the Beast has come to life before our eyes. 
First revealed by Entertainment Weekly , Hot Topic and released a charming geeky clothing line to celebrate the upcoming release of Beauty and the Beast . The fashion of the film is as iconic as the movie itself, and the new collection allows us to finally don those outfits once more—and probably wouldn’t be out-of-place at formal events. [Placeholder for https://www.facebook.com/hottopic/photos/a.10150717698276979.450359.118951846978/10155100004796979/?type=3&theater embed.] Dresses are available in juniors and plus sizes, and the new collection goes beyond just the yellow dress. It includes a stylish white coat , a red cape , a blue ruffle dress that harkens to what Belle wears at the beginning of the film (albeit a bit fancier than what we see), and an off-the-shoulder white dress that has prints from the film on it.
